## FullAnchorSpec type

An anchor spec in the form `{type:..., options:{ ... }}`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FullAnchorSpec = {
    type: AnchorId;
    options: AnchorOptions;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [AnchorId](./common.anchorid.md)<!-- -->, [AnchorOptions](./common.anchoroptions.md)
